mapper.select: select * from v_user t1 where userid=#{id}

mapper.sql: SELECT t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.ENABLE, t1.ISSYSTEM, t1.LOGINNAME, t1.LOGINPWD, t11.MEMO, t11.OWNERID, t11.OWNERTYPE, t1.RESERVER, t1.RESERVER2, t11.SUBTYPE, t1.TIMEZONE, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t11.USERDATA, t11.USERDATA2, t1.USERID, t1.USERMODE, t1.USERNAME, t11.USEROBJECTLEVEL, t11.USEROBJECTTYPE, t1.VALIDFLAG FROM T_SRFUSER t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFUSEROBJECT t11 ON t1.USERID = t11.USEROBJECTID WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1

SELECT t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`ENABLE`, t1.`ISSYSTEM`, t1.`LOGINNAME`, t1.`LOGINPWD`, t11.`MEMO`, t11.`OWNERID`, t11.`OWNERTYPE`, t1.`RESERVER`, t1.`RESERVER2`, t11.`SUBTYPE`, t1.`TIMEZONE`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t11.`USERDATA`, t11.`USERDATA2`, t1.`USERID`, t1.`USERMODE`, t1.`USERNAME`, t11.`USEROBJECTLEVEL`, t11.`USEROBJECTTYPE`, t1.`VALIDFLAG` FROM `T_SRFUSER` t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFUSEROBJECT t11 ON t1.USERID = t11.USEROBJECTID WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1

SELECT t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.ENABLE, t1.ISSYSTEM, t1.LOGINNAME, t1.LOGINPWD, t11.MEMO, t11.OWNERID, t11.OWNERTYPE, t1.RESERVER, t1.RESERVER2, t11.SUBTYPE, t1.TIMEZONE, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t11.USERDATA, t11.USERDATA2, t1.USERID, t1.USERMODE, t1.USERNAME, t11.USEROBJECTLEVEL, t11.USEROBJECTTYPE, t1.VALIDFLAG FROM T_SRFUSER t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFUSEROBJECT t11 ON t1.USERID = t11.USEROBJECTID WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1

SELECT t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.ENABLE, t1.ISSYSTEM, t1.LOGINNAME, t1.LOGINPWD, t11.MEMO, t11.OWNERID, t11.OWNERTYPE, t1.RESERVER, t1.RESERVER2, t11.SUBTYPE, t1.TIMEZONE, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t11.USERDATA, t11.USERDATA2, t1.USERID, t1.USERMODE, t1.USERNAME, t11.USEROBJECTLEVEL, t11.USEROBJECTTYPE, t1.VALIDFLAG FROM T_SRFUSER t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFUSEROBJECT t11 ON t1.USERID = t11.USEROBJECTID WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1

SELECT t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.ENABLE, t1.ISSYSTEM, t1.LOGINNAME, t1.LOGINPWD, t11.MEMO, t11.OWNERID, t11.OWNERTYPE, t1.RESERVER, t1.RESERVER2, t11.SUBTYPE, t1.TIMEZONE, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t11.USERDATA, t11.USERDATA2, t1.USERID, t1.USERMODE, t1.USERNAME, t11.USEROBJECTLEVEL, t11.USEROBJECTTYPE, t1.VALIDFLAG FROM T_SRFUSER t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFUSEROBJECT t11 ON t1.USERID = t11.USEROBJECTID WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1

SELECT t1.[CREATEDATE], t1.[CREATEMAN], t1.[ENABLE], t1.[ISSYSTEM], t1.[LOGINNAME], t1.[LOGINPWD], t11.[MEMO], t11.[OWNERID], t11.[OWNERTYPE], t1.[RESERVER], t1.[RESERVER2], t11.[SUBTYPE], t1.[TIMEZONE], t1.[UPDATEDATE], t1.[UPDATEMAN], t11.[USERDATA], t11.[USERDATA2], t1.[USERID], t1.[USERMODE], t1.[USERNAME], t11.[USEROBJECTLEVEL], t11.[USEROBJECTTYPE], t1.[VALIDFLAG] FROM [T_SRFUSER] t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFUSEROBJECT t11 ON t1.USERID = t11.USEROBJECTID WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1
